root.name: loadImage()
root.description: Loads an image into a variable of type PImage. Three types of images ( .gif, .jpg, .tga) images may be loaded. To load correctly, images must be located in the data directory of the current sketch. If the parameter force is set to "true", the image will not be cached by a web browser, meaning it will have to be downloaded every time the applet is loaded.

parameter.label: filename
parameter.description: string: name of file to load, must be either .gif, .jpg, or .tga
